step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open. Keep up the great work!
You're doing well with stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale and relax as you do this.
Excellent fist-making and pushing down motion! Ensure you're squeezing your shoulder blades together and inhaling as you tighten your muscles.
Great job returning your arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
You've completed the first repetition! Keep the same focus on form and breathing for the next set.
Good start to your second repetition. Remember to maintain a comfortable posture and stretch your arm overhead.
You're doing well stretching your arms overhead. Continue to exhale and relax during this phase.
Nice work making a fist and pushing down! Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together and inhale.
Great job returning your arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Keep the movement fluid.
You've successfully completed all repetitions! You did a great job following the instructions for Push Down Pumping.

exercise_summary: You've done a fantastic job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades together during the push-down phase and relaxing as you extend overhead. Great work completing all repetitions!
